I don't recommend this game to anyone. My friend got banned for a week (this is the second time) only because he "kicked too many player" when in fact they were only russan cheaters, and the 2 kick were in the timespan of 2 games. This makes no sense. If we don't kick cheaters we are to blame, but if we kick cheaters, we are also to blame. Valve says to report them but that statement is also false because of 2 reasons. The first being that valve doesn't give a singular shit about reports and overwatch is also pointless 90% of the times. The second being that instead of kicking if we were to report and they were to hypothetically get banned (which they will not but lets move on) we would still be ruining the game by not kicking him and ruining the game for the other team. ThiS. Doesn't. Make. Any. Sense. At. All.
